Title: Relates to establishing distinctive "POW-MIA" license plates and establishing the "POW-MIA awareness fund"
Summary: Relates to establishing distinctive "POW-MIA" license plates and establishing the "POW-MIA awareness fund" to fund POW-MIA public education and awareness campaigns and veteran services by Rolling Thunder New York chapters and upon approval by the state director of veterans' services.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L; add ยง97-ccc, St Fin L
